title: IPH 93 - Throne Of Grace

lines: I find rest in Your presence,
singing what a faithful God have I.
beacon, my song in the night.
In the shelter of Your wings,
singing what a faithful God have I.
I will tell of Your great love for as
long for as long as I live,
singing what a faithful God have I.

chorus:
What a faithful God have I,
 what a faithful God.
What a faithful God have I,
 faithful in every way.
CCLI: Robert Critchley, b. 1959 and Dawn Critchley, b. 1965 CCLI 128675
